name: Business Intelligence (Business Process & PMO)
description:
Role Description

  • Design KPI and business indicator system according to different business scenarios.
  • Develop and refine business reporting scheme and share the BU's business performance and key projects status in a timely and accurate manner.
  • Conduct focus topic analysis and deliver analysis report, provide data support on business decision and product design.
  • Deep dive business data and proactively find business risk and opportunities.

We require

  • 3 year work experience in data analysis / data mining work experience; internet company and logistics industry experience
  • In depth knowledge in mathematics / statistics / computer science , familiar with statistics analysis tools including SQL, SAS, R tools etc and data warehouse.
  • Logical and strong business sense, systematic thinking
  • Sensitive on numbers and good at summary and data presenting including PPT and narrating.
  • English and Russia is must, Chinese will be plus.
